attributes.action: Give the residents of Kirkby a vote on Everton FC building a new stadium in our town.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The people of Kirkby must be given a choice on Everton FC building a new stadium in our town. The only fair way to do this is to give every Kirkby resident a vote on the subject. This project is the biggest to affect the town since its regeneration in the 1950s and will affect the way of life here for many years. Local people must be given a chance to yes or no.
